description: This file is an HTML webpage that provides a user interface for visualizing and interacting with databases and their tables. It includes styling and Javascript code for dynamically fetching database data, displaying tables, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar with database items.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, re-fetching data from the API and updating the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list in the sidebar, loading tables on demand.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches row data for a specific table and renders it in a scrollable HTML table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML for the data table showing rows and columns, including handling wide content and object formatting.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell values, including handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses table cell contents for long text or objects, toggling between full and truncated views.
